page.title: 14Campion School
page.content:
Bugbrooke Northampton
Campion school was built in 1967. Extra classrooms were added in 1971 and 1975. The Headmaster is Mr Derek Roberts. There are 73 teachers employed in Campion School and there are 60 classrooms. Some of the classrooms are smaller and used for special teaching of older children. At present the school has 1250 pupils. This breaks down to 610 girls and 640 boys. Campion School has many football teams and netball teams. It also has two choirs. One is a junior choir, the other a teachers choir. They have 14 computers but hope to add more to their collection.
